programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Death of a Hero

programme.title: Killer in the Storm
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E01, In the heart of Cajun country, young mother Brenda DuPont is found murdered in her home in May 1988. The initial investigation sputters and turns cold, but her sister Linda vows to solve her murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Sisters In Death

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E24, Guns found dumped in a pond help police to solve the 15-year-old murder of Detroit cab company owner. And the rape and murder of an Atlanta TV station receptionist goes cold for 20 years before DNA links a man to the crime.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Counterstrike
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E07, When the Jaffa modify an Ancient device so that it is capable of defeating the Ori, Adria (Morena Baccarin) leads an attack on Dakara. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Memento Mori
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E08, When Vala (Claudia Black) is kidnapped by Trust members acting under the orders of the Goa'uld Athena, an accident causes her to lose all memory of who she is and where she came from. Also starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Company Of Thieves
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E09, Lt. Col. Cameron Mitchell (Ben Browder) goes undercover to track down the Odyssey, which SG-1 believes was hijacked by the Lucian Alliance. Also starring Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Quest (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E10, SG-1 finds the planet where they believe the Sangraal is. Forced to forge temporary alliances with Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) they undertake a quest to find it. Starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Quest, The: Part II
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E11, Discovering the frozen body of Merlin (guest star Matthew Walker), SG-1 works to help him build the Sangraal before Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and her Ori army can track them down. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Line In The Sand
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E12, Hoping to use Merlin's phasing device to hide a village from the Ori army, something goes wrong forcing Mitchell (Ben Browder) and a critically injured Carter (Amanda Tapping) to hide themselves out of phase from an occupation of Ori soldiers.

programme.title: The Road Not Taken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E13, An experiment goes wrong leaving Lt. Colonel Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) trapped in a parallel reality where martial law has been enforced and Earth is under attack from the Ori. Also starring Ben Browder, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E18, Plagued by terrifying nightmares, Teyla (Rachel Luttrell) begins to recall a time when she and her father were captured by the Wraith and subjected to disturbing experiments. With the help of an old Athosian woman, Teyla looks deep into her past.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E19, With a group of Wraith hive ships on the way to Atlantis, the team searches for a place to flee and a way to destroy the city. McKay (David Hewlett) leads a team to try and activate the Ancients' orbital weapons platform to destroy the Wraith.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E20, Just as the team is beginning to lose hope, Col. Everett is sent from the Stargate Program on Earth. As Everett and the team strategize, a new battleship, the Daedalus, arrives with a new Zero Point Module, bringing with it new hope.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E01, The team is saved with the arrival of Colonel Steven Caldwell, the Daedalus, and the destruction of the two approaching Wraith ships. McKay hopes the Zero Point Module will be the key to their success, meanwhile Ford seems off after an accident.

programme.title: Intruder
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E02, Sheppard starts to question things when strange malfunctions begin to occur after the team returns from a trip to Earth. The team discovers that the Daedalus has been infected with a Wraith Virus, causing the ship to go into survival mode.

programme.title: Runner
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E03, The search for Lt. Ford leads Sheppard and Teyla to planet P3M-736 where they are captured by Ronon Dex, a man who is on the run, being hunted by the Wraith. The team offer to help Ronon, going up against the Wraith once again.

programme.title: Duet
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E04, While on Planet Thenora, the team is shocked when McKay and marine officer Laura Cadman are suddenly taken aboard a Wraith Dart. When the team shoots down the Dart, they discover a technical glitch has put Cadman's consciousness in McKay's body.

programme.title: Condemned
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E05, The team discover a planet that has cruel punishments for anyone who commits a crime; they are placed near the Stargate to be taken by the Wraith. This proves to be too effective forcing the society to put innocent folk in jail to please the Wraith.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E17, Members of the crew begin experiencing disturbingly realistic hallucinations. With the hallucinations spreading to other members of the crew, Dr. Johansen (Alaina Huffman) must track down whatever is causing the episodes before someone dies.

programme.title: Subversion
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E18, After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctor’s switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E22, Kelly and Dylan subdue a man who tries to attack a pregnant woman and her child. Gina receives an offer to become a skating commentator. Noah reveals that he has a half-sister, who is working at a nearby diner.

programme.title: End of the World As We Know It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E23, Noah's father's company is sued by Matt; Katie moves forward with David; a nannycam catches Matt and Kelly making love; Steve goes Y2Krazy, ignoring - or avoiding - a trip with Janet; a model makes a play for Donna.

programme.title: Agony

programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E18, Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E19, Alex tries to save a diamond smuggler whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Neely makes Hobie a tempting offer that divides the Buchannon household.

programme.title: Wave Rage
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E20, After Manny suffers a life-altering injury during a rescue, April tries to save him from himself. Neely meets her match in Alex when she tries to discredit Mitch.

programme.title: Galaxy Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E21, April and Jessie search for the perfect celebrity host for a seaside beauty contest. Mitch and Alex help Manny adjust to his paralysis.

programme.title: Castles in the Sand
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E22, Alex's search for the creator of several elaborate sandcastles is interrupted when she gets stuck entertaining her best friend's fiancée, who falls madly for Mitch. Cody loses his cool when his new boat is stolen while he's scuba diving with Newmie.

programme.title: Aloha Baywatch
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E01, Mitch envisions an International "Top Gun" style lifeguard school in Hawaii. He invites Sean Monroe to lead the new team, which will include a variety of highly-rated lifeguards from beaches around the world.

programme.title: Mahalo Hawaii
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E02, Amidst the chaos, the new Baywatch Hawaii team must learn to work and live together. Jason meets a man with a mysterious past. A girl Mitch saved suffers from secondary drowning, leading to a critical test of the new recruits.

programme.title: Weak Link
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E03, Tanner visits Mitch, tours the Islands, and befriends a dying girl. After failing her initial "test", Dawn challenges Sean to a dangerous contest with her future at Baywatch hanging in the balance. JD competes to join the America's Cup Sailing Team.

programme.title: Shark Island
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E04, Tanner believes The Shark Island Legend. Mitch doesn't. Team Baywatch competes with the Coast Guard. Jessie and Kekoa both dump JD. Swimming naked in a Hawaiian purification ritual, Jesse has to make a rescue in the nude.

programme.title: Strike Team
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E05, Sean leads Team Baywatch on a daring night rescue in shark-infested waters to save 6 kayaking teens stranded off the perilous Na Pali coast.

programme.title: Sunday in Kauai
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E06, Jessie and Kekoa battle each other even as they rescue a man stranded behind a waterfall! Sean and Allie search for treasure. JD and Jason help two girls save a cat caught on a boat mast, but wind up catapulting it across the water!

programme.title: Risk to Death
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E07, Sean threatens to kick Jason off the team after Jason defies his orders and makes a daring rescue. Allie, Dawn, and Nick have to save a drowning man and his pregnant wife about to give birth in the ocean.

programme.title: Father of the Groom
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E08, Sean is faced with a life-or-death decision during a daring cave rescue in which Kekoa faces her greatest fear. Hobie plans to get married, but Mitch is at odds with his fiancée’s obnoxious parents.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E09, The Team hunts men mutilating sharks for their fins. Jason, who's always feared sharks, learns to accept the local tradition that sharks are sacred protectors of the Hawaiian Islands.
